name: Ve Stí­nu Magie
overview: Ve stínu magie (In the shadow of magic) is a 1996 dungeon-crawler, grid-based, fantasy RPG video game developed by Czech company Division and published by JRC Interactive for the Amiga. The Division team created a number of demos on the early 90s. Their next project, Ve stínu magie, was in developed for around half a year until its completion in 1996. The game was originally to be distributed by the company Signum, but the agreement but the agreement fell through, and the Czech market distribution was taken over by JRC company. A sequel was released the following year.The story takes place before ancient and now forgotten times. It was in the days when rumors and legends were just being created and you could meet legendary adventurers that we only know from stories in some of the pubs that were full all over the country.
